channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Temp light issue, 4th July
item.description:
Hello, the temp lights placed at the Odessa junction are creating long tailbacks at 3 of the 4 junctions. It took me 20 mins to move 1/4 mile this afternoon. Please put the permanent lights back on , the junction was working perfectly well even with the missing light. The junction is very busy so lighting needs to be efficient, the temp lights are useless. Please reassess the use of them to improve traffic flow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Job only half done, 4th July
item.description:
The verge outside Broadwell. The verge outside our house (Broadclyst) and our neighbours' house (Broadwell) has been overgrown for ages. Following my second report the verge outside our house was cut today but the part outside our neighbours' house has been left. As a result we are only marginally better able to see to pull out. I may not have worded my report perfectly clearly but it should have been obvious that the whole stretch needed tackling. It's frustrating that someone will have to return to finish the job.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety barriers arounf pothole reported 10th May. Fix My Street ref 5954398treet, 4th July
item.description:
Just cation of Gwinnett Court and Shurdington Road. Safety barriers closing pavement are obscuring sight of oncoming traffic when trying to exit Gwinnett Court. Real problem if in small car not a 4x4. Update earlier in week said work would commence 2 to 4 July. Now says Statr changed to open 13 May 2024. Accident waiting to happen with sight obscured by barriers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
